post.description: Used to fulfill a bill payment.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for a bill in Setu.
parameters.name: platformBillId

parameters.description: Input parameters for Bill Fulfilment.
parameters.name: billFulfilment

currencyCode.description: Currency code of the amount, in the ISO-4217 standard.

value.description: Amount value in the smallest subunit of the currency. If a currency has two or more subunits, use the smallest one. For example, For INR it would be paisa, and for Yen, which has two subunits sen(1/100) and rin(1/1000), it would be rin.

amountExactness.description: Exactness of the bill amount. "ANY" means customer can pay any amount. "EXACT" means customer can pay only the amount specified in the bill. "EXACT_UP" means customer must pay at least the specified amount or more, and "EXACT_DOWN" means customer can pay any amount upto the specified amount. "RANGE" means the customer can pay any amount between amountMin and amountMax specified in the validationRules.

displayName.description: Display name for the amount field.

maximum.description: Maximum amount to be accepted as payment.

minimum.description: Minimum amount to be accepted as payment.

appCredentialsResponse.description: Details of the api keys for the app.

accountID.description: Used to uniquely identify the account.

status.description: HTTP status code for the response.

success.description: Indicator to denote whether the request is successful.

refunds.description: Contains status for each transaction being refunded.

seqNo.description: Unique integer representing individual refund items, used for matching corresponding items in the response.

refunds.description: Contains status for each transaction being refunded.

bill.description: List of required details to pay a bill.

additionalInfo.description: Additional information for the bill passed by the biller.

billerBillID.description: Unique bill identifier in the biller's system.

dueDate.description: Due date of the genrated bill in the ISO 8601 format, upto seconds precision. This date has to be greater than the `billGeneratedOn` date.

fees.description: An array containing bill-level additional costs, such as "Delivery fees" or "Late charges".

generatedOn.description: Generation date of the bill in the ISO 8601 format, upto seconds precision.

items.description: Contains individual line items for the bill.

billAggregates.description: Contains bill-level aggregates of individual data points. For example "Total number of items" is an aggregate.

additionalInfo.description: Additional information which is specific to that bill type.

billerActorID.description: Unique identifier of the biller actor.

billerBillID.description: Unique bill identifier provided by the biller. For GST, it is the CPIN.

discounts.description: Contains the discounts on the bill.

dueDate.description: Due date of the bill in the ISO 8601 format, upto seconds precision.

fees.description: An array containing bill-level additional costs, such as "Delivery fees" or "Late charges".

generatedOn.description: Creation date of the bill in the ISO 8601 format, upto seconds precision.

items.description: Contains individual line items for the bill.

taxes.description: Contains the taxes on the bill.

billFulfilmentRequest.description: Specifications of the bill fulfilment request.

transactionID.description: Unique transaction reference ID for a payment in the payer app system

refID.description: Unique alphanumeric BBPS Reference ID sent by NPCI

platformBillID.description: Unique identifier of bill in Setu.

ifsc.description: IFSC for the VAN address to which the payment was made.

utr.description: Bank UTR for the bill payment made by the customer or the challan number in case of CASH payments.

vanAddress.description: VAN address to which the settlement for the bills were made.

billSettlementRequest.description: Specifications of the bill settlement request.

billTax.description: Tax parent object containing all the relevant taxes and their individual components at the bill-level.

components.description: Parent object containing the breakdown of individual tax components at the bill level.

displayName.description: Display name for the tax applied on the particular bill.

type.description: The type of tax component levied.

billWithBillerBillIdResponse.description: Details of bills for the supplied biller billID.

bills.description: List of bills for the supplied biller billID.

category.description: Category code the biller belongs to.

customerParameters.description: List of parameters to identify a customer for the biller.

logoURL.description: URL of the biller logo in PNG or SVG format.

partner.description: Partner details such as ID and Name.

id.description: Unique identifier of a biller partner in Setu.

name.description: Display name of the biller partner.

attributeName.description: Attribute name to be passed in the fetch bill request.

dataType.description: Data type for the field which needs to be used in validation.

isMandatory.description: Defines if a particular parameter must be passed.

customerIdentifiers.description: List of parameters to uniquely identify a customer.

billerFetchBillsResponse.description: Details of bills for the supplied customer identifiers.

eventData.description: Payload of an event which contains detailed information about an event.

eventTimeStamp.description: The time at which an event occured.

eventType.description: The type of event specific to a product.

chargeType.description: Type of charge levied for processing the payment.

currencyCode.description: Currency code of the amount, in the ISO-4217 standard.

method.description: The method used to calculate the value of a particular component. This is usually done as a flat fee or a percentage. Some examples could be calculating the processing fees for a bill, or the discount amount for an item.

value.description: Amount value in the smallest subunit of the currency. If a currency has two or more subunits, use the smallest one. For example, For INR it would be paisa, and for Yen, which has two subunits sen(1/100) and rin(1/1000), it would be rin.

billerBillID.description: Unique bill identifier provided by the biller. For GST, it is the CPIN.

campaignID.description: This can be used to group payment links.

expiryDate.description: Expiry date of the paymentLink in the ISO 8601 format, upto seconds precision.

name.description: Payee name to be populated in the Payment Link.

transactionNote.description: Used to show a note on payer app

platformBillID.description: Unique identifier of bill in Setu.

customer.description: Details of a customer in the biller system.

additionalInfo.description: Additional details of the customer in the biller system.

name.description: Name of the customer in the biller system.

customerAccount.description: Details of a customer account in the biller system.

additionalInfo.description: Additional details for the customer account in the biller system.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer account in the biller system.

customerIdentifier.description: Unique customer identifier for a particular biller.

attributeName.description: Attribute used to identify a customer of a biller. Could be phone number, PAN or email, depending on the biller.

attributeValue.description: Value of the above customer identifier of a biller. This is entered by the customer in the payer app.

deductionParts.description: Account and split details for the deduction.

discount.description: Contains details about the discount in a particular bill, if available. In a given bill, there could be upto three kinds of discount, bill-level, item-level and fee-level.

code.description: Coupon or voucher used to apply the discount.

reason.description: Reason why the discount was applied.

docURL.description: Link to reference document with details about the error.

errorResponseData.description: Object containing data about the error.

errors.description: List of specific child errors for this request.

traceID.description: Unique trace request identifier for tracing and debugging. Provide this to Setu support.

data.description: Payload of an event which contains detailed information about an event.

timeStamp.description: The time at which an event occured. It is denoted in milliseconds from the Unix epoch.

type.description: The type of event generated by this appID and productInstanceID.

fees.description: Fees levied on the bill or individual items.

fetchBillsDetails.description: Details of the bill to be paid.

billerProductInstanceID.description: Unique identifier of the biller product instance in Setu.

campaignID.description: Unique identifier of the biller campaign.

customerIdentifiers.description: Used to validate the customer account and fetch the bill details.

refID.description: Unique alphanumeric BBPS Reference ID sent by NPCI

fetchBillsResponse.description: Details of bills for the supplied customer identifiers.

bills.description: List of bills for the supplied customer identifiers.

commit_sha.description: GitLab commit-ID of the deployed code

applied_migrations.description: A collection of individual migrations applied till date.

fetchPayerLinkRequest.description: Fetch payer link and one-time token API payload

clientID.description: clientID from the V2 API key pair

secret.description: secret from the V2 API key pair

token.description: One-time auth token to be used to retrieve the JWT for subsequent API requests

billerBillID.description: Unique bill identifier in the biller's system.

paymentDetails.description: Details highlighting the payment of a bill.

additionalInfo.description: Placeholder for any additional info that will be sent with the request.

campaignID.description: Unique identifier of the biller campaign.

instrument.description: Payment method used to pay the bill.

transactionNote.description: Used to show a note on payer app

uniquePaymentRefID.description: Unique reference identifier for the money that Setu received as a payment for the bill.

platformBillID.description: Unique bill identifier in the Setu system.

clientID.description: clientID from the V2 API key pair

secret.description: secret from the V2 API key pair

token.description: Token to be used in subsequent requests

accountIdentifier.description: The masked digits of the account used. In case of `CC` / `DC` / `PREPAID`, it is the last 4 digits of the Card Number. In case of  `NEFT` / `RTGS` / `IFT` / `IMPS`, it is the last 4 digits of the Account Number. In case of `UPI`, it is the VPA. In case of  `PPI` / `CASH`, it is the last 4 digits of Mobile Number.

paidOn.description: Payment date of the bill in the ISO 8601 format, upto seconds precision.

utr.description: Bank UTR for the bill payment made by the customer or the challan number in case of CASH payments.

getActorByIdResponse.description: Details of actor for the supplied actor identifier.

getAppByIdResponse.description: Details of app for the supplied app identifier.

getPartnerByIdResponse.description: Details of partner for the supplied partner identifier.

filters.description: Payload containing the filters to be applied.

productInstanceIDOfReport.description: The unique identifier of the product instance in app for which the report is fetched.

metadata.description: Basic information about what is contained in the report.

records.description: A collection of individual data fields in a report.

reportDetails.description: (Deprecated)Basic information about what is contained in the report.

displayName.description: Display name for the quantity on payers app.

quantity.description: Total number of items in the bill.

itemTax.description: Tax parent object containing all the relevant taxes and their individual components at the item-level.

components.description: Parent object containing the breakdown of individual tax components at the item level.

displayName.description: Display name for the item tax applied on the particular item.

type.description: The type of tax component levied.

code.description: Unique code for the item in the biller system.

displayName.description: Display name for the item on the payer app.

measurementUnit.description: Unit of measurement for the item.

quantity.description: Total number of items of one type.

actors.description: Details of actors for the supplied actor identifiers.

apps.description: Details of apps for the supplied app identifiers.

partners.description: Details of partners for the supplied partner identifiers.

productInstanceID.description: Unique identifier for the product instance.

paymentAddress.description: Payment address info where funds can be deposited.

additionalInfo.description: Payment address details for this type.

identifier.description: Unique identifier of payment address. For ACCOUNT type, it will be AccountID.

paymentAddressType.description: Type of paymnent address. Can be a bank account or UPI handle.

billerBillID.description: Unique bill identifier in the biller's system.

createdAt.description: Creation date of the paymentLink in the format \"2019-08-01T08:28:12Z\".

expiresAt.description: Expiry date of the paymentLink in the format \"2019-08-01T08:28:12Z\".

platformBillID.description: Unique identifier of bill in Setu.

transactionNote.description: Used to show a note on payer app

paymentAddresses.description: Payment addresses such as a VAN or a VPA to which the funds to pay the bill needs to be sent.

platformBillID.description: Unique identifier of bill in Setu.

processingFees.description: Fees involved in processing a particular bill payment / refund.

charges.description: Charges applicable for the transaction made.

productInstance.description: Biller product details such as the ID and Name.

id.description: Unique identifier of a biller product instance in Setu.

name.description: Name of the biller product instance in Setu.

receiptFetchStatus.description: Receipt fetch status for a particular biller. Eg. AVAILABLE.

deductions.description: List of accounts to deduct refund from. Required only if original bill had split settlements specified.

identifier.description: Unique identifier value representing the transaction to be refunded

refundRequestItemAmountType.description: Type of refund. Can be either FULL or PARTIAL. If PARTIAL, refundAmount should also be specified.

refundRequestItemIdentifierType.description: Type of identifier. Currently, only BILL_ID is supported.

deductions.description: List of accounts to deduct refund from.

initiatedAt.description: Refund initiation time in the format \"2019-08-01T08:28:12Z\".

settlementConfiguration.description: Contains the settlement configuration for the bill.

parts.description: Array of settlement parts which have to be split.

settlementParts.description: Part of the bill which has to be split and settled.

remarks.description: Remarks if any for this split transaction.

setuBillDeemedStatus.description: Current deemed status of bill in Setu.

setuBillStatus.description: Current status of bill in Setu.

ifsc.description: IFSC code of the source account.

number.description: Account number of the source account.

sourceAccounts.description: List of source accounts that can be used to pay the bill.

splitAccount.description: Details of the settlement account to which a split has to be settled.

id.description: Beneficiary account id as in Setu's biller actor configuration.

ifsc.description: Beneficiary account IFSC as in Setu's biller actor configuration.

name.description: Beneficiary account name as in Setu's biller actor configuration.

splitDetails.description: Details of split to be processed.

value.description: The value of the split. The value will be an integer in case of `INR` and `BPS`, float in case of `PERCENTAGE`.

taxComponent.description: Describes the tax levied on a particular bill. In a given bill, there could be upto three kinds of taxes, bill-level, item-level and fee-level.

displayName.description: Display name for the particulr tax component on the payers app.

type.description: The type of tax component levied. In a given bill, this will be the breakup of the different types of tax applied.

transactionCount.description: Total number of transactions made in the process.

transactions.description: Individual transaction details of the settlement made by the payment processor.

date.description: Payment date as in the MIS file.

platformBillID.description: Unique identifier of bill in Setu.

utr.description: Bank UTR for the bill payment/ refund made by/to the customer.

ResponseData.description: Encrypted response for VPA verification request.

tags.description: A collection of APIs Setu uses to notify developer partners.
